bibl.title: A Letter of Proklos to Asklepiades: P.Lond.inv. 2553 + P.Col. VIII 211.
bibl.note: New edition of P. Lond. Inv. 2553 [first published in: New Palaeographical Society, Facsimiles of Ancient Manuscripts (London, 1924) pl. 136a] + P. Col. VIII, 211. - Letter of recommandation for Isidoros of Psophthis from Proklos, his patron, to the διοικητής Asklepiades. Philadelphia, 6 A.D.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Col. VIII, 211 + P. Lond. Inv. 2553
Antonia Sarri, A Letter of Proklos to Asklepiades: P.Lond.inv. 2553 + P.Col. VIII 211.

New edition of P. Lond. Inv. 2553 [first published in: New Palaeographical Society, Facsimiles of Ancient Manuscripts (London, 1924) pl. 136a] + P. Col. VIII, 211. - Letter of recommandation for Isidoros of Psophthis from Proklos, his patron, to the διοικητής Asklepiades. Philadelphia, 6 A.D.
